ygData.subject: Re: Holy Swords only ONE per server? Is this right?
ygData.msgSnippet: I think they should be unique, or at least only one chance to get the sword every two months or so....otherwise everyone would have one eventually....or maybe
ygData.messageBody:
I think they should be unique, or at least only one chance to get the
sword every two months or so....otherwise everyone would have one
eventually....or maybe even...one sword per month...if the group
attempting to get the sword fails..it disappears for the rest of that
month. That will at least make getting this or that holy sword something
for great value and fame. Let that paladin's name ring loud and clear
from the forests of Nektulos to the swamps of Innothule.
